subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Re: Ebay auction for sorta Frank's Box?
author: April Abercrombie
full_text:
------=_NextPart_000_0004_01C9D9EE.3E22C640
Content-Type: text/plain;
	charset="iso-8859-1"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: quoted-printable

I have contacted bidders, but only on items I am selling so you may be righ=
t. In fact, I think they initiated the contact with me first now that I thi=
nk about it.

It would make sense because if you don't like someone, just t=
o be rotten you would contact all his bidders to cause trouble.

  ----- Or=
iginal Message ----- 
  From: Kristin Morris 
  To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com=
 
  Sent: Thursday, May 21, 2009 8:17 AM
  Subject: RE: [EVP-ITC] Re: Ebay =
auction for sorta Frank's Box?






  I don't think EBAY allows people to =
contact the bidders anymore.. that's why their names are partially hidden??=
  I know how you feel tho..




-------------------------------------------=
-----------------------------------

  From: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com [mailt=
o:EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com] On Behalf Of April Abercrombie
  Sent: Thursday,=
 May 21, 2009 9:09 AM
  To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com
  Subject: Re: [EVP-ITC=
] Re: Ebay auction for sorta Frank's Box?








  Yes...I know.... but it=
 is fun to fantasize. Plus, if I am in a position to make a difference I wi=
ll. The problem is knowing when or where that position is.



    ----- Ori=
ginal Message ----- 

    From: Kristin Morris 

    To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroup=
s.com 

    Sent: Thursday, May 21, 2009 7:56 AM

    Subject: RE: [EVP-ITC=
] Re: Ebay auction for sorta Frank's Box?



    We can't police the entire=
 internet.  People should take responsibility for themselves and do some re=
search and find out how this works before they purchase.  

    Caveat empt=
or..  


------------------------------------------------------------------=
----------

    From: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com [mailto:EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.c=
om] On Behalf Of April Abercrombie
    Sent: Thursday, May 21, 2009 8:45 AM=

    To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com
    Subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Re: Ebay auctio=
n for sorta Frank's Box?







    Exactly! That's what I'm sayin'.

    W=
ouldn't it be a hoot if Frank himself blasted the guy. But that isn't the m=
ature way..... ;)

      ----- Original Message ----- 

      From: threads=
intyme@... 

      To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com 

      Sent: Thursday,=
 May 21, 2009 5:52 AM

      Subject: RE: [EVP-ITC] Re: Ebay auction for so=
rta Frank's Box?

      Why don't some of us respond to his ad...and take s=
erious issue with this business of his lying to the public about Frank? 

 =
     That info is a serious breach of eBay policy. He could be banned from =
eBay for life. 
      Al
      ---------- Original Message ----------
     =
 From: "Kristin Morris" <ckmorris95@...>
      To: <EVP-ITC@yahoo=
groups.com>
      Subject: RE: [EVP-ITC] Re: Ebay auction for sorta Frank's=
 Box?
      Date: Thu, 21 May 2009 06:16:27 -0500

      WOW.. Frank.  I di=
dn't realize you were charging - and "thousands of dollars" to boot!  Must =
be to pay for that Faraday Cage and the white noise generator thing this ya=
hoo believes are in all your creations.  And hurry because "his supplier" (=
cough - cough Radio Shack) is discontinuing!  But no worries he has "sold o=
ver 2 dozen of these 'Frank's Boxes devices" so he must be legit because he=
 knows - and actual customer bought a 'real' Frank's Box and said it was eq=
ual!  Awesome.

      k


-------------------------------------------------=
-------------------------

      From: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com [mailto:EVP-=
ITC@yahoogroups.com] On Behalf Of ourobouros2k2
      Sent: Thursday, May 2=
1, 2009 12:50 AM
      To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com
      Subject: [EVP-ITC]=
 Re: Ebay auction for sorta Frank's Box?








      Been following this =
unprofessional idiot's items for awhile now. I love how he says that Frank =
charges thousands of dollars for an original Frank's box. 

      This dude=
 is the worst type of con, preying on people who know only enough to be fam=
iliar with the term Frank's box. Then again, it always has bothered me when=
 people take shack hacks and charge stupid prices for them on ebay under th=
e Frank's box moniker.

      This guy is based out of Nevada I believe, an=
d his group's ethics leave little to be desired. Takes all kinds, I reckon.=
..

      Andy

      --- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, Aquarius <laustin@...=
> wrote:
      >
      > Hmmm... saw this on Ebay tonight... you've got to =
read all the text to hear
      > how he describes what he's selling. 
    =
  > 
      > Do any of you on this list know who he is? I just thought this=
 was kind of
      > interesting... see:
      > 
      > http://tinyurl.co=
m/o5pper
      > 
      > Cheers,
      > 
      > Leslie, consistent lurke=
r and occasional poster <g>
      > 
      > "I'm not happy, I'm cheerful. =
There's a difference. A happy woman has no
      > cares at all. A cheerful=
 woman has cares but has learned how to deal with them."
      > 
      > -=
- Beverly Sills (1929-) American Opera Singer
      >
